intro: Waffle Your Way to the Purrfect Picnic!
description:
Who said waffles are only for breakfast? With Waffle Kitty, every day can become a sweet, cozy picnic! 


Here, a fluffy kitty-chef will guide you through the art of making the perfect waffle — golden, crunchy on the outside, soft on the inside, and topped with just the right mix of delicious treats. However, there’s one catch — everything has to fit!


You’ll be challenged to place strawberries, whipped cream, honey drizzles, and even cheeky chocolate chips onto your waffle without leaving a single bite behind. As you progress, your waffles get bigger, the toppings get trickier, and the puzzle gets more and more tasty!


Don’t worry if your first waffle isn’t ideal — practice makes perfect! Each level is a new opportunity to experiment, decorate, and discover the joy of waffles that are almost too cute to eat… almost.


KEY FEATURES: 
- Over 90 delicious waffles to complete! 
- 29 delightful toppings, from fruity favorites to sweet surprises.
- A lively soundtrack to keep your creativity flowing. 
- A cuddly kitty-chef who makes decorating waffles the sweetest challenge. 
- Cozy and colorful visuals that will warm your heart as much as your tastebuds!

So grab your fork and let’s waffle our way to culinary cuteness, just remember, don’t eat them before they’re ready!
